1: -module(jobforge_server_v1_SUITE).
    2: -compile(export_all).
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: 
    5: all() -> [submit_and_result, result_not_found, async_result].
    6: 
    7: submit_and_result(_Config) ->
    8:     Tasks = [
    9:         #{<<"name">> => <<"A">>, <<"command">> => <<"echo A">>, <<"requires">> => []},
   10:         #{<<"name">> => <<"B">>, <<"command">> => <<"echo B">>, <<"requires">> => [<<"A">>]},
   11:         #{<<"name">> => <<"C">>, <<"command">> => <<"echo C">>, <<"requires">> => [<<"B">>]}
   12:     ],
   13:     Input = #{<<"tasks">> => Tasks},
   14:     {ok, _} = application:ensure_all_started(jobforge),
   15:     JobId = jobforge_job_server:process(Input),
   16:     timer:sleep(100),
   17:     {Status, Result} = jobforge_job_server:result(JobId),
   18:     case {Status, Result} of
   19:         {done, {ok, [A, B, C]}} ->
   20:             Names = [maps:get(<<"name">>, A), maps:get(<<"name">>, B), maps:get(<<"name">>, C)],
   21:             case Names of
   22:                 [<<"A">>, <<"B">>, <<"C">>] -> ok;
   23:                 _ -> ct:fail({unexpected_order, Names})
   24:             end;
   25:         {done, {ok, _}} -> ok; % Accept any valid topological order
   26:         _ -> ct:fail({unexpected_result, {Status, Result}})
   27:     end.
   28: 
   29: result_not_found(_Config) ->
   30:     FakeJobId = make_ref(),
   31:     {Status, _} = jobforge_job_server:result(FakeJobId),
   32:     case Status of
   33:         error -> ok;
   34:         _ -> ct:fail({should_be_error, Status})
   35:     end.
   36: 
   37: async_result(_Config) ->
   38:     Tasks = [
   39:         #{<<"name">> => <<"A">>, <<"command">> => <<"echo A">>, <<"requires">> => []},
   40:         #{<<"name">> => <<"B">>, <<"command">> => <<"echo B">>, <<"requires">> => [<<"A">>]},
   41:         #{<<"name">> => <<"C">>, <<"command">> => <<"echo C">>, <<"requires">> => [<<"B">>]}
   42:     ],
   43:     Input = #{<<"tasks">> => Tasks},
   44:     {ok, _} = application:ensure_all_started(jobforge),
   45:     JobId = jobforge_job_server:process(Input),
   46:     % Immediately poll, should be pending or running
   47:     {Status1, _} = jobforge_job_server:result(JobId),
   48:     case Status1 of
   49:         pending -> ok;
   50:         running -> ok;
   51:         done -> ok;
   52:         _ -> ct:fail({unexpected_status, Status1})
   53:     end,
   54:     timer:sleep(100),
   55:     {Status2, Result2} = jobforge_job_server:result(JobId),
   56:     case Status2 of
   57:         done -> ok;
   58:         _ -> ct:fail({not_done, Status2, Result2})
   59:     end.
